span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 33, 33);
font-family: RobotoRegular, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102);

strong.span:
As of Thursday, April 9, 2020 at 5 PM
Connecticut Department of Education Commissioner Miguel Cardona said the decision has been made to continue distance learning until at least May 20 — and that pertains to all school events, including athletics and other previously-planned activities. If that closure needs to be extended, that decision will be revisited.

strong.h2: SUMMER STREET HOCKEY AND SUMMER SOCCER CAMPS

p.span: Due to the uncertainties of the current situation, the Bud Conlan Summer Street Hockey and the Blue Devils Summer Soccer programs will be canceled for this coming summer. This was a very difficult decision to make, but at this time we need to put the safety of the West Haven community first. We appreciate the support the program has had over the past several years and we will be back next year.
The staff will miss you all! Please stay safe!
Read this announcement from the NCAA concerning athletics during Covid-19. Click here to download the document.

p.style: font-size: 2rem; line-height: 2.5rem; overflow: hidden; overflow-wrap: break-word; color: rgb(118, 39, 187);
p.span: Thanks to sponsors IGA, the CT Department of Public Health, the Army National Guard and Liberty Bank, the Virtual Scholar-Athlete Banquet will air at 6:30pm on Sunday, May 3rd on Fox 61 and the NFHS Network. The recipients from WHHS are Taylor Nowak and Brendan Carew. Congratulations Taylor and Brendan!
